required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PF-04191834 Single Dose Bronchodilatory Study In Asthma.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2a, Randomised, Double-Blind (3rd Party Open), Double-Dummy, Placebo And Active Controlled 5-Way Crossover Study To Assess The Bronchodilatory Action, Safety, Toleration And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Oral Doses Of PF-04191834 In Asthmatic Patients.

brief_summary.textblock: Study to determine the bronchodilatory effects of PF-04191834 compared with zileuton in patients with asthma

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1)
primary_outcome.description: The FEV1 is the maximal volume of air that can be forcefully exhaled in one second

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1)
primary_outcome.description: The FEV1 is the maximal volume of air that can be forcefully exhaled in one second

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)
secondary_outcome.description: The FVC is the maximal volume of air that can be exhaled from full inhalation by exhaling as forcefully and rapidly as possible

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Vital Capacity (FVC)
secondary_outcome.description: The FVC is the maximal volume of air that can be exhaled from full inhalation by exhaling as forcefully and rapidly as possible

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Flow Between 25 and 75% of Vital Capacity (FEF25-75)
secondary_outcome.description: The FEF25-75 is the forced expiratory flow between 25 and 75% of vital capacity

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Flow Between 25 and 75% of Vital Capacity (FEF25-75)
secondary_outcome.description: The FEF25-75 is the forced expiratory flow between 25 and 75% of vital capacity

other_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUClast)
other_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, 2, 4, 5, 6, 10, 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
other_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration time-curve from zero to the last measured concentration (AUClast)

other_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, 2, 4, 5, 6, 10, 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.

other_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
other_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, 2, 4, 5, 6, 10, 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
Pre-dose, 2, 4, 5, 6, 10, 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
other_outcome.description: Plasma decay half-life is the time measured for the plasma concentration to decrease by one half.

other_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC (0 - 8)]
other_outcome.time_frame: 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
other_outcome.description: AUC (0 - 8)= Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from time zero (pre-dose) to extrapolated infinite time (0 - 8). It is obtained from AUC (0 - t) plus AUC (t - 8).

intervention.description: 30mg PF-04191834, single dose, oral dispersion + 2 x placebo tablets.
100mg PF-04191834, single dose, oral dispersion + 2 x placebo tablets, single dose.
2000mg PF-04191834, single dose, oral dispersion + 2 x placebo tables, single dose
1200mg, 2 x 600mg tablets, single dose + placebo oral dispersion, single dose.
2 x placebo tablets + placebo oral dispersion, single dose.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Persistent mild/moderate asthma for at least 6 months.
- Reduced lung function
- Reversible airway obstruction
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant/nursing females.
- Liver function tests greater than upper limit of normal (ULN)

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

group.title: Treatment Sequence 1
group.description: Placebo/Zileuton CR 1200 mg/PF-04191834 30 mg/PF-04191834 2000 mg/PF-04191834 100 mg

group.title: Treatment Sequence 2
group.description: PF-04191834 100 mg/PF-04191834 30 mg/PF-04191834 2000 mg/Placebo/Zileuton CR 1200 mg

group.title: Treatment Sequence 3
group.description: PF-04191834 2000 mg/PF-04191834 100 mg/Zileuton CR 1200 mg/PF-04191834 30 mg/Placebo

group.title: Treatment Sequence 4
group.description: PF-04191834 30 mg/Placebo/PF-04191834 100 mg/Zileuton CR 1200 mg/PF-04191834 2000 mg

group.title: Treatment Sequence 5
group.description: Zileuton CR 1200 mg/PF-04191834 2000 mg/Placebo/PF-04191834 100 mg/PF-04191834 30 mg

group.title: All Participants
group.description: Participants receiving any of the 5 treatments (PF-04191834 30 mg, PF-04191834 100 mg, PF-04191834 2000 mg, Zileuton CR 1200 mg and Placebo) in a randomized fashion first

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1)
outcome.description: The FEV1 is the maximal volume of air that can be forcefully exhaled in one second
outcome.population: All enrolled participants treated who had at least 1 concentration in at least 1 treatment period

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants received a single oral dose of placebo for zileuton CR tablets or placebo for PF-04191834 oral aqueous dispersion in any treatment period

group.title: Zileuton CR 1200 mg
group.description: Paticipants received a single oral dose of zileuton CR 1200 mg (2 x 600 mg tablets) in any treatment period

measure.title: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)

outcome.title: Plasma Decay Half-Life (t1/2)
outcome.description: Plasma decay half-life is the time measured for the plasma concentration to decrease by one half.
outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose, 2, 4, 5, 6, 10, 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
outcome.population: Since the PK sample collection only occurred until 24 hours and the approximate t1/2 at all doses appeared to be >10 hours, t1/2 and area under the plasma concentration versus time curve until infinity (AUCinf) are not reported at any dose level.

group.title: PF-04191834 30 mg
group.description: Participants received a single oral dose of PF-04191834 30 mg in any treatment period

measure.title: Plasma Decay Half-Life (t1/2)
measure.description: Plasma decay half-life is the time measured for the plasma concentration to decrease by one half.
measure.population: Since the PK sample collection only occurred until 24 hours and the approximate t1/2 at all doses appeared to be >10 hours, t1/2 and area under the plasma concentration versus time curve until infinity (AUCinf) are not reported at any dose level.

outcome.title: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC (0 - 8)]
outcome.description: AUC (0 - 8)= Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from time zero (pre-dose) to extrapolated infinite time (0 - 8). It is obtained from AUC (0 - t) plus AUC (t - 8).
outcome.time_frame: 14 and 24 hours following dosing in each period.
outcome.population: Since the PK sample collection only occurred until 24 hours and the approximate t1/2 at all doses appeared to be >10 hours, t1/2 and area under the plasma concentration versus time curve until infinity (AUCinf) are not reported at any dose level.

measure.title: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC (0 - 8)]
measure.description: AUC (0 - 8)= Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) from time zero (pre-dose) to extrapolated infinite time (0 - 8). It is obtained from AUC (0 - t) plus AUC (t - 8).
measure.population: Since the PK sample collection only occurred until 24 hours and the approximate t1/2 at all doses appeared to be >10 hours, t1/2 and area under the plasma concentration versus time curve until infinity (AUCinf) are not reported at any dose level.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Pfizer has the right to review disclosures, requesting a delay of less than 60 days. Investigator will postpone single center publications until after disclosure of pooled data (all sites), less than 12 months from study completion/termination at all participating sites. Investigator may not disclose previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results.
